name: Wooden Target: Training Regimen
description: A simple and lightweight target used for archery or shooting practice, frequently seen within the Flower-Feather Clan. Compared to conventional targets, the ones used here are specifically designed for aerial dynamic shooting, making them lighter and with a larger surface area. Though this makes them more susceptible to damage, it does not shorten their overall lifespan. After all, accurately hitting a bullseye while flying is no easy task...
